forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain late. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers later at night. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 2C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 36F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 25F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
